articles.content: Lebanon defeated India 1-0 in the 2023 Kings Cup final at the 700th Anniversary of Chiang Mai stadium in Thailand to finish third. The games lone goal was scored by Lebanons Kassem El Zein acrobatic … [+2256 chars]
